224:7: syādeva rūkṣamanasāmapi ca prasādo dharmyāḥ kathāśca ramaṇīyataratvamīyuḥ||2||
224:9: lokottamasya caritātiśayapradeśaiḥ svaṃ prātibhaṃ gamayituṃ śrutivallabhatvam||3||
224:11: sarvajña ityavitathākṣaradīptakīrti mūrdhnā name tamasamaṃ sahadharmasaṃgham||4||
224:13: sarvasattveṣvakāraṇaparamavatsalasvabhāvaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ pūrvajanmasvapi sa bhagavāniti buddhe bhagavati paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ||
224:15: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavānbhūtaḥ pratijñātiśayasadṛśairdānapriyavacanārthacaryāprabhṛtibhiḥ prajñāparigrahaniravadyaiḥ kārūṇyanisyandairlokamanugṛhṇan svadharmābhiratyupanataśucivṛttinyuditodite mahati brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra|
224:16: sa kṛtasaṃskārakramo jātakarmādibhirabhivardhamānaḥ prakṛtimedhāvitvātsānāthyaviśeṣājjñānakautūhalādakausīdyācca nacireṇaivāṣṭādaśasu vidyāsthāneṣu svakulakramāviruddhāsu ca sakalāsu kalāsvācāryakaṃ padamavāpa|
224:17: sa brahmavad brahmavidāṃ babhūva rājeva rājñāṃ bahumānapātram|
224:29: asaṃstutasyāpi janasya loke so'bhūt priyastasya yathaiva lokaḥ||9||
224:35: maitryādike caiva manaḥsamādhau yathābalaṃ so'nuśaśāsa śiṣyān||12||
224:36: atha kadācitsa mahātmā pariniṣpannabhūyiṣṭhe pṛthūbhūte śiṣyagaṇe pratiṣṭhāpite'sminkalyāṇe vartmanyavatārite naiṣkramyasatpathaṃ loke saṃvṛteṣvivāpāyadvāreṣu rājamārgīkṛteṣviva sugatimārgeṣu dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ tatkālaśiṣyeṇājitenānugamyamāno yogānukūlān parvatadarīnikuñjānanuvicacāra|
224:47: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ sasaṃbhramāmreḍitapadaṃ svabhāvātiśayavyañjakaṃ karuṇābalasamāhitākṣaraṃ śiṣyamuvāca-vatsa vatsa!
224:59: yādṛcchikī tasya hi lābhasaṃpat kāryātyayaḥ syācca tathā mamāyam||21||
224:61: nirātmake bhedini sārahīne duḥkhe kṛtadhne satatāśucau ca|
224:62: dehe parasmāyupayujyamāne na prītimānyo na vicakṣaṇaḥ saḥ||22||
224:64: na cānyaduḥkhe sati me'sti saukhyaṃ satyāṃ ca śaktau kimupekṣakaḥ syām||23||
224:65: satyāṃ ca śaktau mama yadyupekṣā syādātatāyinyapi duḥkhamagne|
224:66: kṛtveva pāpaṃ mama tena cittaṃ dahyeta kakṣaṃ mahatāgnineva||24||
224:68: saṃrakṣaṇaṃ putravadhācca mṛgyā mṛgyāḥ sakāśācca tadātmajānām||25||
224:76: kadā nu gātrairapi nāma kuryāṃ hitaṃ pareṣāmiti yaśca me'bhūt|
224:79: na spardhayā naiva yaśo'bhilāṣānna svargalābhānna ca rājyahetoḥ|
224:81: tathā mamānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca|
224:82: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ||31||
224:83: dṛṣṭe guṇe'nusmṛtimāgato vā spaṣṭaḥ kathāyogamupāgato vā|
224:87: atha sā vyāghrī tena bodhisattvasya śarīranipātaśabdena samutthāpitakautūhalāmarṣā viramya svatanayavaiśasodyamāttato nayane vicikṣepa|
224:88: dṛṣṭai va ca bodhisattvaśarīramudgataprāṇaṃ sahasābhisṛtya bhakṣayitumupacakrame|
224:89: atha sa tasya śiṣyo māṃsamanāsādyaiva pratinivṛttaḥ kutropādhyāya iti vilokayaṃstadbodhisattvaśarīramudgataprāṇaṃ tayā vyāghrayuvatyā bhakṣyamāṇaṃ dardaśa|
224:91: aho dayāsya vyasanāture jane svasaukhyanaiḥsaṅgyamaho mahātmanaḥ|
224:92: aho prakarṣaṃ gamitā sthitiḥ satāmaho pareṣāṃ mṛditā yaśaḥśriyaḥ||34||
224:93: aho parākrāntamapetasādhvasaṃ guṇāśrayaṃ prema paraṃ pradarśitam|
224:96: aho madīyā gamitā prakāśatāṃ khaṭuṅkatā vikramasaṃpadānayā||36||
224:97: anena nāthena sanāthatāṃ gataṃ na śocitavyaṃ khalu sāṃprataṃ jagat|
224:103: tadevaṃ sarvasattveṣvakāraṇaparamavatsalasvabhāvaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ pūrvajanmasvapi sa bhagavāniti buddhe bhagavati paraḥ prasādaḥ kāryaḥ|
224:107: evaṃ duṣkaraśatasamudānītatvāt karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyamevaṃ svabhāvātiśayasya niṣpādikā parānugrahapravṛttihetuḥ karuṇeti|
